description: And for our first shoot in our new barn set we have two fantastic girls paired up: ChinaWhite and DragonLily. These two are best friends in real life, and in fact it was DragonLily who talked ChinaWhite into trying Fuckingmachines in the first place. You can't beat two beautiful Asian ladies fucking each other with big dildos.
title: DragonLily and ChynaWhite
